name: ITP - Separable Portion 3 (Intersection Upgrade)
Pavements
Subgrade
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Pavement and Surfacing Technical Specification, clause 2.1
TEST/TASK REQUIRED - Scala and/or Benkelman Beam Deflections
INSPECTION BY - After excavation and prior to any construction, installation or backfilling

TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Areas that fail to achieve the minimum subgrade CBR and deflection criteria will require the construction of Subgrade Improvement Layers (SIL). Acceptance by Engineer before proceeding.
Imported Granular Fill
TEST/TASK REQUIRED - Record of Fill
INSPECTION BY - On completion of granular fill layer.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Submitted to Engineer.
SIL Material Testing
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Pavement and Surfacing Technical Specification, clause 2.2.2
TEST/TASK REQUIRED - Material Test Certificates
INSPECTION BY - Prior to using the material on site
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Material meets specification. Material approval by Engineer.
Subgrade Improvement Layer
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Pavement and Surfacing Technical Specification, clause 2.2
TEST/TASK REQUIRED - Benkelman Beam Deflections
INSPECTION BY - Benkelman Beam testing where possible on completion Subgrade Improvement Layers. On completiond of the Subgrade Improvement layer. Inspection by the Engineer.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Benkelman Beam Deflections meet specification. Acceptance by Engineer before proceeding.
Lean Mix Concrete Layer
TEST/TASK REQUIRED - Concrete Dockets, Benkelman Beam Deflections
INSPECTION BY - On completion of the Lean Mix Concrete layer.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Increase in Benkelman Beam Deflections meet Engineers criteria. Acceptance by Engineer before proceeding.
Lower Subbase Material Testing
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Pavement and Surfacing Technical Specification, clause 2.3.2
TEST/TASK REQUIRED - Material Test Certificates
INSPECTION BY - Prior to using the material on site
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Material meets specification. Material approval by Engineer.
Lower Subbase
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Pavement and Surfacing Technical Specification, clause 2.3
TEST/TASK REQUIRED - NDM Testing and Benkelman Beam Deflections
INSPECTION BY - On completion of the Lowe Subbase layer, prior to construction Upper Subbase layer.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - NDM results and Benkelman Beam Deflections meet specification. Acceptance by the Engineer.
Upper Subbase Material Testing
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Pavement and Surfacing Technical Specification, clause 2.4.2
TEST/TASK REQUIRED - Material Test Certificates
INSPECTION BY - Prior to using the material on site
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Material meets specification. Material approval by Engineer.
Upper Subbase
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Pavement and Surfacing Technical Specification, clause 2.4
TEST/TASK REQUIRED - NDM Testing and Benkelman Beam Deflections
INSPECTION BY - On completion of the Upper Subbase layer, prior to construction of the Basecourse layer.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - NDM results and Benkelman Beam Deflections meet specification. Acceptance by the Engineer.
Basecourse Material Testing
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - CON21015 Project Specification, clause 23.8
TEST/TASK REQUIRED - Material Test Certificates
INSPECTION BY - Prior to using the material on site
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Material meets specification. Material approval by Engineer.
Basecourse
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - CON21015 Project Specification, clause 23.8
TEST/TASK REQUIRED - NDM Testing and Benkelman Beam Deflections
INSPECTION BY - On completion of the Basecourse layer, prior to construction of the deep lift or wearing course layers.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - NDM results and Benkelman Beam Deflections meet specification. Acceptance by the Engineer.
AC20 Material Testing
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - NZTA M10 Specification
TEST/TASK REQUIRED - Material Test Certificates
INSPECTION BY - Prior to using the material on site
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Material meets specification. Material approval by Engineer.
AC20 Deep Lift Layers
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - NZTA M10 Specification
TEST/TASK REQUIRED - Testing as per NZTA M10
INSPECTION BY - On completion of the AC20 Deep Lift Layers, prior to construction of the AC14 wearing course.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Testing results meet specification. Acceptance by the Engineer.
AC14 Material Testing
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - NZTA M10 Specification
TEST/TASK REQUIRED - Testing as per NZTA M10
INSPECTION BY - Prior to using the material on site
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Material meets specification. Material approval by Engineer.
AC14 Wearing Course
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - NZTA M10 Specification
TEST/TASK REQUIRED - Testing as per NZTA M10
INSPECTION BY - On completion of the AC14 wearing course.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Testing results meet specification. Acceptance by the Engineer.
Two Coat Chip Seal Surfacing
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Pavement and Surfacing Technical Specification, clause 2.12
TEST/TASK REQUIRED - Testing as per clause 2.12
STORMWATER
Stormwater Construction Methodology
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - CON21015 Project Specification, clause 18
TEST/TASK REQUIRED - Construction Methodology submitted for specific works
INSPECTION BY - Prior to the commencement of specific works
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Construction Methodology accepted by the Engineer.
Stormwater Installation
TEST/TASK REQUIRED - Photos, as-built drawings and CCTV of installed stormwater
INSPECTION BY - On completion of the installation of the stormwater system.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Installation meets WDC Engineering Standards.
SEWER
Sewer Construction Methodology
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - CON21015 Project Specification, clause 18
TEST/TASK REQUIRED - Construction Methodology submitted for specific works
INSPECTION BY - Prior to the commencement of specific works
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Construction Methodology accepted by the Engineer.
Sewer Installation
TEST/TASK REQUIRED - Photos, PE weld records, pressure testing records, as-built drawings
INSPECTION BY - On completion of the installation of the sewer system.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Installation meets WDC Engineering Standards.
WATER
Water Construction Methodology
TEST/TASK REQUIRED - Construction Methodology submitted for specific works
INSPECTION BY - Prior to the commencement of specific works
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Construction Methodology accepted by the Engineer.
Watermain Installation
TEST/TASK REQUIRED - Photos, PE weld records, pressure testing records, chlorination records, as-built drawings
INSPECTION BY - On completion of the installation of the watermain system
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Installation meets WDC Engineering Standards and WDC Water Services General Specification.
CONCRETE WORKS
Kerb and Channel
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - CON21015 Project Specification, clause 22.3
TEST/TASK REQUIRED - Photos, concrete dockets
INSPECTION BY - On completion of kerb and channel construction.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Construction meets specification.
Vehicle Crossings
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - CON21015 Project Specification, clause 22.6
TEST/TASK REQUIRED - Photos, concrete dockets, CIV results
INSPECTION BY - On completion of vehicle crossing construction.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Construction meets specification.
Concrete Footpaths
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - CON21015 Project Specification, clause 22.5
TEST/TASK REQUIRED - Photos, concrete dockets, CIV results
INSPECTION BY - On completion of shared user path construction.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Construction meets specification.
Coloured Concrete (Islands, KiwiRail)
TEST/TASK REQUIRED - Photos, concrete dockets
INSPECTION BY - On completion of coloured concrete construction.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Construction meets specification.
LIGHTING
Lighting Material Supply
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - CON21015 Project Specification, clause 26.3
TEST/TASK REQUIRED - Material dockets/statements
INSPECTION BY - On completion of lighting installation.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Materials meet lighting specification.
Lighting Installation
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - CON21015 Project Specification, clause 26.3
TEST/TASK REQUIRED - Checklists confirming installation and electrical testing
INSPECTION BY - On completion of lighting installation.

TRAFFIC SIGNALS
Traffic Signals Material Supply
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - CON21015 Project Specification, clause 25.8
TEST/TASK REQUIRED - Material dockets/statements
INSPECTION BY - On completion of traffic signal installation.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Materials meet traffic signal specification.
Traffic Signals Installation
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - CON21015 Project Specification, clause 25.8
TEST/TASK REQUIRED - Checklists confirming installation and electrical testing
INSPECTION BY - On completion of traffic signal installation.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Materials meet traffic signal specification.
TRAFFIC SERVICES
Pavement Marking
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - CON21015 Project Specification, clause 25.2
TEST/TASK REQUIRED - Material dockets/statements, set-out
INSPECTION BY - On completion of pavement marking.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Pavement markings meet NZTA M07 specification and IFC drawings.
Tactile Ground Indicators
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - CON21015 Project Specification, clause 25.2
TEST/TASK REQUIRED - Photos, material dockets
INSPECTION BY - On completion of tactile paving installation.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Tactile paving installed as per IFC drawings.
FINISHING WORKS
Landscaping
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Port Road Roundabout Landscape Drawings (IFC)
TEST/TASK REQUIRED - Photos, Supplier Dockets
INSPECTION BY - On completion of landscaping/installation.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Installation as per IFC Port Road Roundabout Landscape Drawings
Reserve Fencing
TEST/TASK REQUIRED - Photos
INSPECTION BY - On completion of reserve fencing.

KIWIRAIL LEVEL CROSSING
Pedestrian Access and Fencing

INSPECTION BY - On completion of pedestrian access installation.
